definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full

sentences.english: He can keep high-spirited selling products in chills for the whole day.
sentences.chinese: 他能一整天都站在寒风里精力充沛地销售产品。

sentences.english: He is energetic, even though he is in his latter years.
sentences.chinese: 虽然已是迟暮之年，但他依然精力充沛。

sentences.english: David says the real secret to his vitality is what he eats.
sentences.chinese: 大卫说其实他精力充沛的真正秘诀是他吃的食物。

sentences.english: Get some rest. It would recharge your energy levels and ensure you put things in perspective.
sentences.chinese: 休息会让你重新精力充沛，并且确保你洞察一切。

sentences.english: Picture of young Carolyn Bessette show what vitality she had.
sentences.chinese: 照片上年轻的卡罗林曾经是那样的精力充沛。

sentences.english: You're a peppy little spit-fuck, aren't you?
sentences.chinese: 你是个精力充沛的小杂种，是吧？

sentences.english: You will have a childlike approach this week, big hearted and full of spunk.
sentences.chinese: 本周你有孩童般的心，博爱，精力充沛。

sentences.english: The right man for the job needs to be enthusiastic and energetic.
sentences.chinese: 这份工作的适合人选应该是满腔热情而且精力充沛的。

sentences.english: And best of all, I still have energy during this time.
sentences.chinese: 而最重要的是，我在这段时间中依然精力充沛。

sentences.english: On every front there are young people abounding in vigor and vitality.
sentences.chinese: 在各条战线上都有精力充沛朝气蓬勃的青年人。

sentences.english: You want to be sharp, but you usually feel sleepy after lunch.
sentences.chinese: 你想要精力充沛，可你总是在午饭后感到昏昏欲睡。

sentences.english: Though nearly seventy years of age, he is still hale and fresh as paint.
sentences.chinese: 他虽年近七十，但身子硬朗，精力充沛。

sentences.english: Hodgins: You really think I'm lusty?
The Black Russian Terrier is a robust, large and powerful dog.
sentences.chinese: 黑俄罗斯梗是一种精力充沛的大型力量型犬。

sentences.english: This vocal vitality is related to energy level.
sentences.chinese: 这种声音的生动性是与精力充沛程度相关的。

sentences.english: Our brains are wired to be curious.
sentences.chinese: 我们的大脑对好奇总是精力充沛的。

definition: in high spirits (idiom); glowing with health and vigor
spirit trembling with excitement (idiom); in high spirits/lively and full of enthusiasm/full of energy/con brio
lit. vitality a hundredfold (idiom); refreshed/one's vigor thoroughly restored
in great spirits/to have great vitality
in glowing spirits (idiom); bursting with life/radiating health and vigor
